info.author: Florian Schulze
info.description:
Changelog
=========

1.0b3 - unreleased
------------------

* Renamed mr.awsome to ploy and mr.awsome.openvz to ploy_openvz.
  [fschulze]


1.0b2 - 2014-05-15
------------------

* Moved setuptools-git from setup.py to .travis.yml, it's only needed for
  releases and testing.
  [fschulze]


1.0b1 - 2014-03-24
------------------

* Initial release
  [fschulze]
info.name: ploy_openvz
info.summary: A plugin for ploy providing support for OpenVZ containers.

1.0b3 - unreleased

  • Renamed mr.awsome to ploy and mr.awsome.openvz to ploy_openvz. [fschulze]

1.0b2 - 2014-05-15

  • Moved setuptools-git from setup.py to .travis.yml, it’s only needed for releases and testing. [fschulze]
